<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Fast Movement](/Feats.aspx?ID=140) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=18" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 89 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your rage is a frenzy of rapid movements. While you are raging, you gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed.
name: Fast Movement
